name: @jobinjahq/injakit
description: Stimulus controllers and Tailwind CSS components
author: Reza Shadman

scripts.release:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run sync-composer && git add . && git commit -m "bump version to $(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && git tag v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm run sync-composer && git add . && git commit -m "bump version to $(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && git tag v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && npm run sync-composer && git add . && git commit -m "bump version to $(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && git tag v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:beta: npm version prerelease --preid=beta --no-git-tag-version && npm run sync-composer && git add . && git commit -m "bump version to $(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && git tag v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git push && git push --tags
scripts.sync-composer: node -e "const pkg=require('./package.json'); const composer=require('./composer.json'); composer.version=pkg.version; require('fs').writeFileSync('composer.json', JSON.stringify(composer, null, 2) + '\n');"
